head.title: Structures and Functions Review and Assessment

body.p: Before taking the quiz below, consider again the learning objectives for this module. Could you demonstrate each of these objectives? If so, you will be ready for the assessment below. If not, consider reviewing content related to these objectives before attempting the assessment.

ul.li: Describe the major functions of the lymphatic system. Define immunity.
Compare and contrast interstitial fluid and lymph.
Compare and contrast lymphatic vessels and blood vessels in terms of structure and function. Describe the mechanisms of lymph formation and circulation. Describe the path of lymph circulation.
Describe the mechanisms of lymph formation and circulation. Describe the path of lymph circulation.
Identify dysfunction associated with the lymphatic circulation.
Describe early events in the history of immunology in relation to current understanding of immunity.
Identify major diseases associated with the lymphatic system and their causes.
